Deprecated API

Deprecated Methods
com.wilko.jaim.JaimConnection.addBuddy(String)
          the JaimConnection.watchBuddy(java.lang.String) method should be used instead 
com.wilko.jaim.JaimConnection.deleteBuddy(String)
          use JaimConnection.unwatchBuddy(java.lang.String) instead 
com.wilko.jaim.JaimConnection.getInterMessageDelay()
          This function is no longer used 
com.wilko.jaim.JaimConnection.setEventListener(JaimEventListener)
          replaced by JaimConnection.addEventListener(com.wilko.jaim.JaimEventListener) 
com.wilko.jaim.JaimConnection.setInterMessageDelay(long)
          This function is no longer used - send throttling is automatic
